gurmukhi: ਜੈਸੇ ਪਾਕਸਾਲਾ ਬਾਲਾ ਬਿੰਜਨ ਅਨੇਕ ਰਚੈ ਛੁਅਤ ਅਪਾਵਨ ਛਿਨਕ ਛੋਤ ਲਾਗ ਹੈ
transliteration: Jaisay Paakasaalaa Baalaa Binjan Anayk Rachai , Chhuat Apaavan Chhinak Chhot Laag Hai ?
translation: Just as a woman cooks many dishes in a kitchen but a small act of unholiness makes the food contaminated or sullied.

gurmukhi: ਜੈਸੇ ਤਨ ਸਾਜਤ ਸਿੰਗਾਰ ਨਾਰਿ ਅਾਨੰਦ ਕੈ ਪੁਹਪਵੰਤੀ ਹ੍ਵੈ ਪ੍ਰਿਯਾ ਸਿਹਜਾ ਤਿਅਾਗ ਹੈ
transliteration: Jaisay Tan Saajat Singaar Naari Aanand Kai , Puhapavantee Hvai Priyaa Sihajaa Tiaag Hai ?
translation: Just as a woman embellishes her body and enjoys the union with her husband, but if her menstruation is due, the husband refrains from sharing bed with her.

gurmukhi: ਜੈਸੇ ਗ੍ਰਭਧਾਰ ਨਾਰਿ ਜਤਨ ਕਰਤ ਨਿਤ ਮਲ ਮੈ ਗਰਭ ਛੇਦ ਖੇਦ ਨਿਹਭਾਗ ਹੈ
transliteration: Jaisay Grabhadhaar Naari Jatan Karat Nita , Mal Mai Garabh Chhayd Khayd Nihabhaag Hai ?
translation: Just as a woman makes every effort for the safety of her pregnancy, but if her menstruation re-starts, there is every fear of miscarriage. She then feels distressed and is called unfortunate.

gurmukhi: ਤੈਸੇ ਸੀਲ ਸੰਜਮ ਜਨਮ ਪਰਜੰਤ ਕੀਜੈ ਤਨਕ ਹੀ ਪਾਪ ਕੀੲੇ ਤੂਲ ਮੈ ਬਜਾਗ ਹੈ ||੬੩੭||
transliteration: Taisay Seel Sanjam Janam Parajant Keejai , Tanak Hee Paap Keeay Tool Mai Bajaag Hai ?637?
translation: Similarly, one should maintain disciplined life and piety of actions. But, if even a small sin is committed, it is like a dreadful fire in a bail of cotton. (One small wrong act destroys all the goodness that had been earned.)  (637)
